title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the Export dialog window.
2. Select both projects created earlier.
3. Give the zip file a name (such as test.zip).
4. Begin export to zip file.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name but under different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up. The details in the message box highlight the file of the same name in project2 as the problem.
EB: The export process should successfully create a zip file containing all the selected files, even if they have the same name but are located in different directories.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Export dialog window.
2. Select multiple files with the same name but from different directories.
3. Give the zip file a name.
4. Start the export process and verify if the error message appears.
